attributes.action: Ban Guy Verhofstadt from campaigning in the UK European Elections
attributes.background: Guy Verhofstadt is prominent of the EU Parliament seeking movement towards Federalisation and transfer of sovereignty. Transfer of sovereignty is contrary to the UK constitution. He should be banned from campaigning in UK elections. Such interference would not be tolerated from countries e.g.Russia.

rejection.details: The UK Parliament and Government are not responsible for the views of individual politicians.
